name.help: Name of the VDOM that you are adding the RADIUS server to.
name.name: name

radius-server-vdom.help: Use this option to select another VDOM containing a VDOM RSSO RADIUS server to use for the current VDOM.
radius-server-vdom.name: radius-server-vdom

status.help: Enable/disable the RSSO RADIUS server for this VDOM.
status.name: status

options.help: Enable the RSSO RADIUS server for this VDOM.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable the RSSO RADIUS server for this VDOM.
options.name: disable

results.help: Configure a RADIUS server to use as a RADIUS Single Sign On (RSSO) server for this VDOM.
results.name: vdom-radius-server
